frame.name: Shaped_part
frame.definition:
<def-root>An entity is a shaped <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>. The <fen>Part</fen> may correspond in form and function to a part of another entity. For instance, the leg of a table supports the weight of a table like the leg of an animal or person supports their weight. The <fen>Orientation</fen> of the <fen>Part</fen> relative to the <fen>Whole</fen> may be expressed.
<ex>I removed the <fex name="Part"><t>brim</t></fex> <fex name="Whole">of the hat</fex></ex>
<ex>Bill likes to chew the <fex name="Part_prop">waxy</fex> <fex name="Part"><t>rind</t></fex> <fex name="Whole">of the cheese</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A shaped <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
<ex>Sergey put his arm on the <t><fex name="Part">arm</fex></t> of his armchair.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Whole</fen> which has a shaped <fen>Part</fen>.
<ex>The <t>leg</t> <fex name="Whole">of the table</fex> came off when we moved it.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part_prop
FE.definition:
<def-root>A property relating to the shaped <fen>Part</fen> of a <fen>Whole</fen>.
<ex>Sue fixed the <fex name="Part_prop">broken</fex> <t><fex name="Part">leg</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the table</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Orientation
FE.definition:
<def-root>This is a property of the shaped <fen>Part</fen> that situates the <fen>Part</fen> within the <fen>Whole</fen>.
<ex>Abby broke the <fex name="Orientation">top</fex> <t><fex name="Part">handle</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the suitcase</fex> . </ex></def-root>
